message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $200 is already a very competitive price. I could come down to $170, but that's my absolute best offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research and budget, I am comfortable offering $120 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $120 is too low for me. I can meet you halfway at $145. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal carefully, and I would like to counter with an offer of $130 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
